members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the unit was created.

members.description: Date and time when the unit was created.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the unit.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the unit.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the unit was last modified.

members.description: Date and time when the unit was last modified.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the unit.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the unit.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the uom.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the uom.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the uom.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the uom.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a descriptive title or name for the unit of measure.

members.description: Type a descriptive title or name for the unit of measure.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: baseUoM

constantValues: Choose the base or primary unit on which the unit is based.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the base or primary unit on which the unit is based.

members.name: isScheduleBaseUoM

constantValues: Tells whether the unit is the base unit for the associated unit group.

members.description: Tells whether the unit is the base unit for the associated unit group.

members.name: organizationId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the unit of measure.

members.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the unit of measure.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the ID of the unit group that the unit is associated with.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the ID of the unit group that the unit is associated with.

members.name: createdByExternalParty

constantValues: Shows the external party who created the record.

members.description: Shows the external party who created the record.

members.name: modifiedByExternalParty

constantValues: Shows the external party who modified the record.
